summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are mentioned in relation to the analysis of cigarette smoke components. Specifically, 1,3-butadiene is a compound analyzed in the smoke of the 1R5F reference cigarette, which is a specific type of cigarette used for testing. The terms refer to the same chemical compound, with Buta-1,3-diene being an alternative name for Butadiene, indicating a direct chemical relationship rather than a functional or contextual one.
